en.purpose: To calculate the estimated body surface area based on the Mosteller formula.
en.use:
Use the most recent height and weight measurements to ensure accuracy.

Use in conjunction with other assessments and patient history.

Fill in all the input fields to calculate the total score.
en.misuse:
Not to be used for calculating BSA based on other formulas. 

Less precise for neonates and infants, as well as for individuals at extreme values of height and weight.

other_details.references: Mosteller RD. Simplified calculation of body-surface area. N Engl J Med. 1987 Oct 22;317(17):1098. doi: 10.1056/NEJM198710223171717. PMID: 3657876.
other_details.en: To calculate body surface area using the Mosteller formula.

gt0001.text: Body Surface Area (BSA) score calculation - Mosteller formula
gt0001.description: A  calculation score used to estimate an individual's total external surface area using the Mosteller formula. The formula expresses BSA in squared meters (m2) and uses a person's weight in kilograms (kg) and height/length in centimeters (cm), in accordance with: (Height(cm) x Weight(kg) / 3600 ) ^½. It aids in calculating dosages for medications, such as chemotherapy, and measuring cardiac index.
